explains: adj. 体贴的，考虑周到的；<旧>小心的，谨慎的

sentences.en: It was very considerate of him to wait.
sentences.cn: 他一直在等候着，真是体贴人。

sentences.en: He was charming, considerate and impeccably mannered.
sentences.cn: 他富有魅力，待人体贴，举止无可挑剔。

sentences.en: She is always polite and considerate towards her employees.
sentences.cn: 她对待雇员总是客客气气，关心体谅。
